parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The time when the task ends. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: The website ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) operation.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The time when the task starts. Specify the time in the YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ format.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The task type. Valid values:

*   **file**: purges the cache by file URL.
*   **preload**: prefetches files.
*   **directory**: purges the cache by directory.
*   **ignoreparams**: purges the cache by URL with specified parameters ignored.
